titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Wilmot Rufus Jones (1902-1970), son of Wilmot Rufus Jones (b. 1882) and Mary Lee Bufkin, was a 1923 graduate of Haverford College. He was a member of the Haverford Board of Managers, the Haverford Corporation, and the Haverford Alumni Council.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of the papers of Wilmot R. Jones related to his role as member of the Haverford Board of Managers, the Haverford Corporation, and the Haverford Alumni Council. Materials include correspondence, meeting minutes, budgets records of fundraising efforts and reunions, and printed materials, such as college newspapers and brochures.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
